Bayern reclaimed top spot in the Bundesliga hours after being knocked off the summit by RB Leipzig, despite an awful start to another epic encounter on Sunday (AEST).
The champions were two behind i… [+4254 chars]

articles.author: Mitch Cleary
articles.title: Life after Joe: Dons' twin towers impress, new Cats make their mark - AFL
articles.description: Geelong fended off a strong challenge from Essendon at GMHBA Stadium to win their AAMI Community Series clash
articles.content:
TWIN towers Cale Hooker and Peter Wright proved there will be life after Joe Daniher with prominent displays in Essendon's AAMI Community Series loss to Geelong on Saturday night.
